channel.title: backpacking on In the mountains,
channel.description: Recent content in backpacking on In the mountains,

item.title: Skyline Trail
item.description: Skyline was probably the hike that first led me to backpacking. I discovered it two years ago in 2016⁄17 and since then, was obsessed with the thought of hiking it. Now that I’ve actually done it, it feels strange! The weather was good, the views were great, the company was awesome, I packed my gear really well (light), the only thing that wassn’t good were my knees. Date: 19-08-03 to 19-08-05

item.title: Egypt Lake
item.description: Date: 19-06-29 to 19-07-01 Location: Banff Friends: Chris, Kat, Nick, Ivan, Eric, Tess, Evan
